62  /**
63   * Tests for function support on CacheSQL...
64   *
65   * @author Jonathan Levinson
66   */
67  @RequiresDialect( value = Cache71Dialect.class )
68  public class SQLFunctionsInterSystemsTest extends BaseCoreFunctionalTestCase {
69  	private static final Logger log = Logger.getLogger( SQLFunctionsInterSystemsTest.class );
70  
71  	public String[] getMappings() {
72  		return new String[] {
73  				"legacy/AltSimple.hbm.xml",
74  				"legacy/Broken.hbm.xml",
75  				"legacy/Blobber.hbm.xml",
76  				"dialect/functional/cache/TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass.hbm.xml"
77  		};
78  	}
79  
80  	@Test
81  	public void testDialectSQLFunctions() throws Exception {
82  		Session s = openSession();
83  		Transaction t = s.beginTransaction();
84  
85  		Simple simple = new Simple( Long.valueOf( 10 ) );
86  		simple.setName("Simple Dialect Function Test");
87  		simple.setAddress("Simple Address");
88  		simple.setPay(new Float(45.8));
89  		simple.setCount(2);
90  		s.save( simple );
91  
92  		// Test to make sure allocating an specified object operates correctly.
93  		assertTrue(
94  				s.createQuery( "select new org.hibernate.test.legacy.S(s.count, s.address) from Simple s" ).list().size() == 1
95  		);
96  
97  		// Quick check the base dialect functions operate correctly
98  		assertTrue(
99  				s.createQuery( "select max(s.count) from Simple s" ).list().size() == 1
100 		);
101 		assertTrue(
102 				s.createQuery( "select count(*) from Simple s" ).list().size() == 1
103 		);
104 
105 		List rset = s.createQuery( "select s.name, sysdate, floor(s.pay), round(s.pay,0) from Simple s" ).list();
106 		assertNotNull("Name string should have been returned",(((Object[])rset.get(0))[0]));
107 		assertNotNull("Todays Date should have been returned",(((Object[])rset.get(0))[1]));
108 		assertEquals("floor(45.8) result was incorrect ", new Integer(45), ( (Object[]) rset.get(0) )[2] );
109 		assertEquals("round(45.8) result was incorrect ", new Float(46), ( (Object[]) rset.get(0) )[3] );
110 
111 		simple.setPay(new Float(-45.8));
112 		s.update(simple);
113 
114 		// Test type conversions while using nested functions (Float to Int).
115 		rset = s.createQuery( "select abs(round(s.pay,0)) from Simple s" ).list();
116 		assertEquals("abs(round(-45.8)) result was incorrect ", new Float(46), rset.get(0));
117 
118 		// Test a larger depth 3 function example - Not a useful combo other than for testing
119 		assertTrue(
120 				s.createQuery( "select floor(round(sysdate,1)) from Simple s" ).list().size() == 1
121 		);
122 
123 		// Test the oracle standard NVL funtion as a test of multi-param functions...
124 		simple.setPay(null);
125 		s.update(simple);
126 		Double value = (Double) s.createQuery("select mod( nvl(s.pay, 5000), 2 ) from Simple as s where s.id = 10").list().get(0);
127 		assertTrue( 0 == value.intValue() );
128 
129 		// Test the hsql standard MOD funtion as a test of multi-param functions...
130 		value = (Double) s.createQuery( "select MOD(s.count, 2) from Simple as s where s.id = 10" )
131 				.list()
132 				.get(0);
133 		assertTrue( 0 == value.intValue() );
134 
135         s.delete(simple);
136 		t.commit();
137 		s.close();
138 	}
139 
140 	public void testSetProperties() throws Exception {
141 		Session s = openSession();
142 		Transaction t = s.beginTransaction();
143 		Simple simple = new Simple( Long.valueOf( 10 ) );
144 		simple.setName("Simple 1");
145 		s.save( simple );
146 		Query q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name=:name and s.count=:count");
147 		q.setProperties(simple);
148 		assertTrue( q.list().get(0)==simple );
149 		//misuse of "Single" as a propertyobject, but it was the first testclass i found with a collection ;)
150 		Single single = new Single() { // trivial hack to test properties with arrays.
151 			@SuppressWarnings( {"unchecked"})
152 			String[] getStuff() { 
153 				return (String[]) getSeveral().toArray(new String[getSeveral().size()]);
154 			}
155 		};
156 
157 		List l = new ArrayList();
158 		l.add("Simple 1");
159 		l.add("Slimeball");
160 		single.setSeveral(l);
161 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name in (:several)");
162 		q.setProperties(single);
163 		assertTrue( q.list().get(0)==simple );
164 
165 
166 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name in (:stuff)");
167 		q.setProperties(single);
168 		assertTrue( q.list().get(0)==simple );
169 		s.delete(simple);
170 		t.commit();
171 		s.close();
172 	}
173 
174 	public void testBroken() throws Exception {
175 		Session s = openSession();
176 		Transaction t = s.beginTransaction();
177 		Broken b = new Fixed();
178 		b.setId( Long.valueOf( 123 ));
179 		b.setOtherId("foobar");
180 		s.save(b);
181 		s.flush();
182 		b.setTimestamp( new Date() );
183 		t.commit();
184 		s.close();
185 
186 		s = openSession();
187 		t = s.beginTransaction();
188 		s.update(b);
189 		t.commit();
190 		s.close();
191 
192 		s = openSession();
193 		t = s.beginTransaction();
194 		b = (Broken) s.load( Broken.class, b );
195 		t.commit();
196 		s.close();
197 
198 		s = openSession();
199 		t = s.beginTransaction();
200 		s.delete(b);
201 		t.commit();
202 		s.close();
203 	}

205 	public void testNothinToUpdate() throws Exception {
206 		Session s = openSession();
207 		Transaction t = s.beginTransaction();
208 		Simple simple = new Simple( Long.valueOf(10) );
209 		simple.setName("Simple 1");
210 		s.save( simple );
211 		t.commit();
212 		s.close();
213 
214 		s = openSession();
215 		t = s.beginTransaction();
216 		s.update( simple );
217 		t.commit();
218 		s.close();
219 
220 		s = openSession();
221 		t = s.beginTransaction();
222 		s.update( simple );
223 		s.delete(simple);
224 		t.commit();
225 		s.close();
226 	}

228 	public void testCachedQuery() throws Exception {
229 		Session s = openSession();
230 		Transaction t = s.beginTransaction();
231 		Simple simple = new Simple( Long.valueOf(10) );
232 		simple.setName("Simple 1");
233 		s.save( simple );
234 		t.commit();
235 		s.close();
236 
237 		s = openSession();
238 		t = s.beginTransaction();
239 		Query q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name=?");
240 		q.setCacheable(true);
241 		q.setString(0, "Simple 1");
242 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
243 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
244 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
245 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name=:name");
246 		q.setCacheable(true);
247 		q.setString("name", "Simple 1");
248 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
249 		simple = (Simple) q.list().get(0);
250 
251 		q.setString("name", "Simple 2");
252 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==0 );
253 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==0 );
254 		simple.setName("Simple 2");
255 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
256 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
257 		t.commit();
258 		s.close();
259 
260 		s = openSession();
261 		t = s.beginTransaction();
262 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name=:name");
263 		q.setString("name", "Simple 2");
264 		q.setCacheable(true);
265 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
266 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
267 		t.commit();
268 		s.close();
269 
270 		s = openSession();
271 		t = s.beginTransaction();
272 		s.update( simple );
273 		s.delete(simple);
274 		t.commit();
275 		s.close();
276 
277 		s = openSession();
278 		t = s.beginTransaction();
279 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name=?");
280 		q.setCacheable(true);
281 		q.setString(0, "Simple 1");
282 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==0 );
283 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==0 );
284 		t.commit();
285 		s.close();
286 	}
287 
288 	public void testCachedQueryRegion() throws Exception {
289 		Session s = openSession();
290 		Transaction t = s.beginTransaction();
291 		Simple simple = new Simple( Long.valueOf(10) );
292 		simple.setName("Simple 1");
293 		s.save( simple );
294 		t.commit();
295 		s.close();
296 
297 		s = openSession();
298 		t = s.beginTransaction();
299 		Query q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name=?");
300 		q.setCacheRegion("foo");
301 		q.setCacheable(true);
302 		q.setString(0, "Simple 1");
303 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
304 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
305 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
306 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name=:name");
307 		q.setCacheRegion("foo");
308 		q.setCacheable(true);
309 		q.setString("name", "Simple 1");
310 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
311 		simple = (Simple) q.list().get(0);
312 
313 		q.setString("name", "Simple 2");
314 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==0 );
315 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==0 );
316 		simple.setName("Simple 2");
317 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
318 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
319 		t.commit();
320 		s.close();
321 
322 		s = openSession();
323 		t = s.beginTransaction();
324 		s.update( simple );
325 		s.delete(simple);
326 		t.commit();
327 		s.close();
328 
329 		s = openSession();
330 		t = s.beginTransaction();
331 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name=?");
332 		q.setCacheRegion("foo");
333 		q.setCacheable(true);
334 		q.setString(0, "Simple 1");
335 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==0 );
336 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==0 );
337 		t.commit();
338 		s.close();
339 	}
340 
341 	public void testSQLFunctions() throws Exception {
342 		Session s = openSession();
343 		Transaction t = s.beginTransaction();
344 		Simple simple = new Simple( Long.valueOf(10) );
345 		simple.setName("Simple 1");
346 		s.save(simple );
347 
348 		s.createQuery( "from Simple s where repeat('foo', 3) = 'foofoofoo'" ).list();
349 		s.createQuery( "from Simple s where repeat(s.name, 3) = 'foofoofoo'" ).list();
350 		s.createQuery( "from Simple s where repeat( lower(s.name), (3 + (1-1)) / 2) = 'foofoofoo'" ).list();
351 
352 		assertTrue(
353 				s.createQuery( "from Simple s where upper( s.name ) ='SIMPLE 1'" ).list().size()==1
354 		);
355 		assertTrue(
356 				s.createQuery(
357 						"from Simple s where not( upper( s.name ) ='yada' or 1=2 or 'foo'='bar' or not('foo'='foo') or 'foo' like 'bar' )"
358 				).list()
359 						.size()==1
360 		);
361 
362 		assertTrue(
363 				s.createQuery( "from Simple s where lower( s.name || ' foo' ) ='simple 1 foo'" ).list().size()==1
364 		);
365 		assertTrue(
366 				s.createQuery( "from Simple s where lower( concat(s.name, ' foo') ) ='simple 1 foo'" ).list().size()==1
367 		);
368 
369 		Simple other = new Simple( Long.valueOf(20) );
370 		other.setName( "Simple 2" );
371 		other.setCount( 12 );
372 		simple.setOther( other );
373 		s.save( other );
374 		//s.find("from Simple s where s.name ## 'cat|rat|bag'");
375 		assertTrue(
376 				s.createQuery( "from Simple s where upper( s.other.name ) ='SIMPLE 2'" ).list().size()==1
377 		);
378 		assertTrue(
379 				s.createQuery( "from Simple s where not ( upper( s.other.name ) ='SIMPLE 2' )" ).list().size()==0
380 		);
381 		assertTrue(
382 				s.createQuery(
383 						"select distinct s from Simple s where ( ( s.other.count + 3 ) = (15*2)/2 and s.count = 69) or ( ( s.other.count + 2 ) / 7 ) = 2"
384 				).list()
385 						.size()==1
386 		);
387 		assertTrue(
388 				s.createQuery(
389 						"select s from Simple s where ( ( s.other.count + 3 ) = (15*2)/2 and s.count = 69) or ( ( s.other.count + 2 ) / 7 ) = 2 order by s.other.count"
390 				).list()
391 						.size()==1
392 		);
393 		Simple min = new Simple( Long.valueOf(30) );
394 		min.setCount( -1 );
395 		s.save(min );
396 
397 		assertTrue(
398 				s.createQuery( "from Simple s where s.count > ( select min(sim.count) from Simple sim )" )
399 						.list()
400 						.size()==2
401 		);
402 		t.commit();
403 		t = s.beginTransaction();
404 		assertTrue(
405 				s.createQuery(
406 						"from Simple s where s = some( select sim from Simple sim where sim.count>=0 ) and s.count >= 0"
407 				).list()
408 						.size()==2
409 		);
410 		assertTrue(
411 				s.createQuery(
412 						"from Simple s where s = some( select sim from Simple sim where sim.other.count=s.other.count ) and s.other.count > 0"
413 				).list()
414 						.size()==1
415 		);
416 
417 		Iterator iter = s.createQuery( "select sum(s.count) from Simple s group by s.count having sum(s.count) > 10" )
418 				.iterate();
419 		assertTrue( iter.hasNext() );
420 		assertEquals( Long.valueOf( 12 ), iter.next() );
421 		assertTrue( !iter.hasNext() );
422 		iter = s.createQuery( "select s.count from Simple s group by s.count having s.count = 12" ).iterate();
423 		assertTrue( iter.hasNext() );
424 
425 		s.createQuery(
426 				"select s.id, s.count, count(t), max(t.date) from Simple s, Simple t where s.count = t.count group by s.id, s.count order by s.count"
427 		).iterate();
428 
429 		Query q = s.createQuery("from Simple s");
430 		q.setMaxResults( 10 );
431 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==3 );
432 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s");
433 		q.setMaxResults( 1 );
434 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
435 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s");
436 		assertTrue( q.list().size() == 3 );
437 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name = ?");
438 		q.setString( 0, "Simple 1" );
439 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
440 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name = ? and upper(s.name) = ?");
441 		q.setString(1, "SIMPLE 1");
442 		q.setString( 0, "Simple 1" );
443 		q.setFirstResult(0);
444 		assertTrue( q.iterate().hasNext() );
445 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name = :foo and upper(s.name) = :bar or s.count=:count or s.count=:count + 1");
446 		q.setParameter( "bar", "SIMPLE 1" );
447 		q.setString( "foo", "Simple 1" );
448 		q.setInteger("count", 69);
449 		q.setFirstResult(0);
450 		assertTrue( q.iterate().hasNext() );
451 		q = s.createQuery("select s.id from Simple s");
452 		q.setFirstResult(1);
453 		q.setMaxResults( 2 );
454 		iter = q.iterate();
455 		int i=0;
456 		while ( iter.hasNext() ) {
457 			assertTrue( iter.next() instanceof Long );
458 			i++;
459 		}
460 		assertTrue( i == 2 );
461 		q = s.createQuery("select all s, s.other from Simple s where s = :s");
462 		q.setParameter("s", simple);
463 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
464 
465 
466 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s where s.name in (:name_list) and s.count > :count");
467 		HashSet set = new HashSet();
468 		set.add("Simple 1");
469 		set.add("foo");
470 		q.setParameterList( "name_list", set );
471 		q.setParameter("count", new Integer(-1) );
472 		assertTrue( q.list().size()==1 );
473 
474 		ScrollableResults sr = s.createQuery("from Simple s").scroll();
475 		sr.next();
476 		sr.get(0);
477 		sr.close();
478 
479 		s.delete( other );
480 		s.delete( simple );
481 		s.delete( min );
482 		t.commit();
483 		s.close();
484 
485 	}
486 
487 	public void testBlobClob() throws Exception {
488 		Session s = openSession();
489 		s.beginTransaction();
490 		Blobber b = new Blobber();
491 		b.setBlob( s.getLobHelper().createBlob( "foo/bar/baz".getBytes() ) );
492 		b.setClob( s.getLobHelper().createClob("foo/bar/baz") );
493 		s.save(b);
494 		//s.refresh(b);
495 		//assertTrue( b.getClob() instanceof ClobImpl );
496 		s.flush();
497 		s.refresh(b);
498 		//b.getBlob().setBytes( 2, "abc".getBytes() );
499         log.debug("levinson: just bfore b.getClob()");
500         b.getClob().getSubString(2, 3);
501 		//b.getClob().setString(2, "abc");
502 		s.flush();
503 		s.getTransaction().commit();
504 		s.close();
505 
506 		s = openSession();
507 		s.beginTransaction();
508 		b = (Blobber) s.load( Blobber.class, new Integer( b.getId() ) );
509 		Blobber b2 = new Blobber();
510 		s.save(b2);
511 		b2.setBlob( b.getBlob() );
512 		b.setBlob(null);
513 		//assertTrue( b.getClob().getSubString(1, 3).equals("fab") );
514 		b.getClob().getSubString(1, 6);
515 		//b.getClob().setString(1, "qwerty");
516 		s.flush();
517 		s.getTransaction().commit();
518 		s.close();
519 
520 		s = openSession();
521 		s.beginTransaction();
522 		b = (Blobber) s.load( Blobber.class, new Integer( b.getId() ) );
523 		b.setClob( s.getLobHelper().createClob("xcvfxvc xcvbx cvbx cvbx cvbxcvbxcvbxcvb") );
524 		s.flush();
525 		s.getTransaction().commit();
526 		s.close();
527 
528 		s = openSession();
529 		s.beginTransaction();
530 		b = (Blobber) s.load( Blobber.class, new Integer( b.getId() ) );
531 		assertTrue( b.getClob().getSubString(1, 7).equals("xcvfxvc") );
532 		//b.getClob().setString(5, "1234567890");
533 		s.flush();
534 		s.getTransaction().commit();
535 		s.close();
536 	}
537 
538 	public void testSqlFunctionAsAlias() throws Exception {
539 		String functionName = locateAppropriateDialectFunctionNameForAliasTest();
540 		if (functionName == null) {
541             log.info("Dialect does not list any no-arg functions");
542 			return;
543 		}
544 
545         log.info("Using function named [" + functionName + "] for 'function as alias' test");
546 		String query = "select " + functionName + " from Simple as " + functionName + " where " + functionName + ".id = 10";
547 
548 		Session s = openSession();
549 		Transaction t = s.beginTransaction();
550 		Simple simple = new Simple( Long.valueOf(10) );
551 		simple.setName("Simple 1");
552 		s.save( simple );
553 		t.commit();
554 		s.close();
555 
556 		s = openSession();
557 		t = s.beginTransaction();
558 		List result = s.createQuery( query ).list();
559 		assertTrue( result.size() == 1 );
560 		assertTrue(result.get(0) instanceof Simple);
561 		s.delete( result.get(0) );
562 		t.commit();
563 		s.close();
564 	}
565 
566 	@SuppressWarnings( {"ForLoopReplaceableByForEach"})
567 	private String locateAppropriateDialectFunctionNameForAliasTest() {
568 		for (Iterator itr = getDialect().getFunctions().entrySet().iterator(); itr.hasNext(); ) {
569 			final Map.Entry entry = (Map.Entry) itr.next();
570 			final SQLFunction function = (SQLFunction) entry.getValue();
571 			if ( !function.hasArguments() && !function.hasParenthesesIfNoArguments() ) {
572 				return (String) entry.getKey();
573 			}
574 		}
575 		return null;
576 	}
577 
578 	public void testCachedQueryOnInsert() throws Exception {
579 		Session s = openSession();
580 		Transaction t = s.beginTransaction();
581 		Simple simple = new Simple( Long.valueOf(10) );
582 		simple.setName("Simple 1");
583 		s.save( simple );
584 		t.commit();
585 		s.close();
586 
587 		s = openSession();
588 		t = s.beginTransaction();
589 		Query q = s.createQuery("from Simple s");
590 		List list = q.setCacheable(true).list();
591 		assertTrue( list.size()==1 );
592 		t.commit();
593 		s.close();
594 
595 		s = openSession();
596 		t = s.beginTransaction();
597 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s");
598 		list = q.setCacheable(true).list();
599 		assertTrue( list.size()==1 );
600 		t.commit();
601 		s.close();
602 
603 		s = openSession();
604 		t = s.beginTransaction();
605 		Simple simple2 = new Simple( Long.valueOf(12) );
606 		simple2.setCount(133);
607 		s.save( simple2 );
608 		t.commit();
609 		s.close();
610 
611 		s = openSession();
612 		t = s.beginTransaction();
613 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s");
614 		list = q.setCacheable(true).list();
615 		assertTrue( list.size()==2 );
616 		t.commit();
617 		s.close();
618 
619 		s = openSession();
620 		t = s.beginTransaction();
621 		q = s.createQuery("from Simple s");
622 		list = q.setCacheable(true).list();
623 		assertTrue( list.size()==2 );
624 		for ( Object o : list ) {
625 			s.delete( o );
626 		}
627 		t.commit();
628 		s.close();
629 
630 	}
631 
632 	public void testInterSystemsFunctions() throws Exception {
633         Calendar cal = new GregorianCalendar();
634         cal.set(1977,6,3,0,0,0);
635         java.sql.Timestamp testvalue = new java.sql.Timestamp(cal.getTimeInMillis());
636         testvalue.setNanos(0);
637         Calendar cal3 = new GregorianCalendar();
638         cal3.set(1976,2,3,0,0,0);
639         java.sql.Timestamp testvalue3 = new java.sql.Timestamp(cal3.getTimeInMillis());
640         testvalue3.setNanos(0);
641 
642         final Session s = openSession();
643         s.beginTransaction();
644         try {
645 			s.doWork(
646 					new Work() {
647 						@Override
648 						public void execute(Connection connection) throws SQLException {
649 							Statement stmt = ((SessionImplementor)s).getTransactionCoordinator().getJdbcCoordinator().getStatementPreparer().createStatement();
650 							((SessionImplementor)s).getTransactionCoordinator().getJdbcCoordinator().getResultSetReturn().executeUpdate( stmt, "DROP FUNCTION spLock FROM TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass" );
651 						}
652 					}
653 			);
654         }
655         catch (Exception ex) {
656             System.out.println("as we expected stored procedure sp does not exist when we drop it");
657 
658         }
659 		s.getTransaction().commit();
660 
661         s.beginTransaction();
662 		s.doWork(
663 				new Work() {
664 					@Override
665 					public void execute(Connection connection) throws SQLException {
666 						Statement stmt = ((SessionImplementor)s).getTransactionCoordinator().getJdbcCoordinator().getStatementPreparer().createStatement();
667 						String create_function = "CREATE FUNCTION SQLUser.TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass_spLock\n" +
668 								"     ( INOUT pHandle %SQLProcContext, \n" +
669 								"       ROWID INTEGER \n" +
670 								" )\n" +
671 								" FOR User.TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass " +
672 								"    PROCEDURE\n" +
673 								"    RETURNS INTEGER\n" +
674 								"    LANGUAGE OBJECTSCRIPT\n" +
675 								"    {\n" +
676 								"        q 0\n" +
677 								"     }";
678 						((SessionImplementor)s).getTransactionCoordinator().getJdbcCoordinator().getResultSetReturn().executeUpdate( stmt, create_function );
679 					}
680 				}
681 		);
682         s.getTransaction().commit();
683 
684         s.beginTransaction();
685 
686         TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass object = new TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass( Long.valueOf( 10 ) );
687         object.setDateText("1977-07-03");
688         object.setDate1( testvalue );
689         object.setDate3( testvalue3 );
690         s.save( object );
691         s.getTransaction().commit();
692         s.close();
693 
694         Session s2 = openSession();
695         s2.beginTransaction();
696         TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass test = (TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass) s2.get(TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass.class, Long.valueOf(10));
697         assertTrue( test.getDate1().equals(testvalue));
698         test = (TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass) s2.get(TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass.class, Long.valueOf(10), LockMode.UPGRADE);
699         assertTrue( test.getDate1().equals(testvalue));
700         Date value = (Date) s2.createQuery( "select nvl(o.date,o.dateText) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o" )
701 				.list()
702 				.get(0);
703         assertTrue( value.equals(testvalue));
704         Object nv = s2.createQuery( "select nullif(o.dateText,o.dateText) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o" )
705 				.list()
706 				.get(0);
707         assertTrue( nv == null);
708         String dateText = (String) s2.createQuery(
709 				"select nvl(o.dateText,o.date) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o"
710 		).list()
711 				.get(0);
712         assertTrue( dateText.equals("1977-07-03"));
713         value = (Date) s2.createQuery( "select ifnull(o.date,o.date1) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o" )
714 				.list()
715 				.get(0);
716         assertTrue( value.equals(testvalue));
717         value = (Date) s2.createQuery( "select ifnull(o.date3,o.date,o.date1) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o" )
718 				.list()
719 				.get(0);
720         assertTrue( value.equals(testvalue));
721         Integer pos = (Integer) s2.createQuery(
722 				"select position('07', o.dateText) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o"
723 		).list()
724 				.get(0);
725         assertTrue(pos.intValue() == 6);
726         String st = (String) s2.createQuery( "select convert(o.date1, SQL_TIME) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o" )
727 				.list()
728 				.get(0);
729         assertTrue( st.equals("00:00:00"));
730         java.sql.Time tm = (java.sql.Time) s2.createQuery(
731 				"select cast(o.date1, time) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o"
732 		).list()
733 				.get(0);
734         assertTrue( tm.toString().equals("00:00:00"));
735         Double diff = (Double) s2.createQuery(
736 				"select timestampdiff(SQL_TSI_FRAC_SECOND, o.date3, o.date1) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o"
737 		).list()
738 				.get(0);
739         assertTrue(diff.doubleValue() != 0.0);
740         diff = (Double) s2.createQuery(
741 				"select timestampdiff(SQL_TSI_MONTH, o.date3, o.date1) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o"
742 		).list()
743 				.get(0);
744         assertTrue(diff.doubleValue() == 16.0);
745         diff = (Double) s2.createQuery(
746 				"select timestampdiff(SQL_TSI_WEEK, o.date3, o.date1) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o"
747 		).list()
748 				.get(0);
749         assertTrue(diff.doubleValue() >= 16*4);
750         diff = (Double) s2.createQuery(
751 				"select timestampdiff(SQL_TSI_YEAR, o.date3, o.date1) from TestInterSystemsFunctionsClass as o"
752 		).list()
753 				.get(0);
754         assertTrue(diff.doubleValue() == 1.0);
755 
756         s2.getTransaction().commit();
757         s2.close();
758     }
759
